entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers changing to rain at times heavy late this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
